ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A Faceted_b_rep_shape_representation is a type of Geometric_model. It is a collection of solids described by their envelopes represented with planar polygonal facets.
Each envelope is defined by at least for facets. The topological normal of the shell is defined as being directed from the finite to the infinite region.
This entity is incompletely modelled in the ARM. Complete specification can be obtained in the definition of the corresponding MIM entity.
